title: fix: remove unstable flux-2-dev, add qwen-character, update airforce pricing
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Introduced the `qwen-character` text model for roleplay and reduced pricing for Airforce-powered models.
gist.impact: Users gain a specialized model for character interactions and significantly lower costs for image and video generation.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot dressed as a bard on a small wooden stage, performing for an audience of tiny pixel flowers. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text 'Roleplay'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
